Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Inglaterra, you'll be centrally located in Granada, steps from Madraza of Granada and Capilla Real. This hotel is within close proximity of Isabel la Catolica Plaza and Plaza Nueva.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 36 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Planning an event in Granada? This hotel has facilities measuring 807 square feet (75 square meters), including a meeting room. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Madraza of Granada - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Capilla Real - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Isabel la Catolica Plaza - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Plaza Nueva - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi

Sagrario Church - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi

Royal Chapel of Granada - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Arab Baths - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
San Juan de Dios Museum - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Casa del Arte Flamenco Theater - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Alcaiceria - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Corral del Carbon Monument - 0.2 km / 0.2 mi
San Gil y Santa Ana Church - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Plaza Bib-Rambla - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Inglaterra is Granada (GRX-Federico Garcia Lorca) - 15.9 km / 9.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
